info.name: League of Legend - Compact Tribunal
info.description:
This style is intended to make navigating the cases in tribunal faster and more intuitive with a more condensed interface.


Better quality screenshots : http://imgur.com/a/HcapF
info.additionalInfo:
v2.22
Small tweaks for items and summoner spell images

v2.21
Fix for the report cards

v2.2
Updated for the tribunal leaderboards

v2.11
Small revamp of the tribunal.

v2.10
Upgraded to fit the new tribunal revamp.

v2.04
Restyled voting box.

v2.03
Added support for the report cards.

v2.02
Improved behavior for Twisted Treeline games.

v2.01
Improved Voting box position in higher resolution.

v2
New tribunal (so much better), new style.
